name: The Lost Island (itch)
description:
After a shipwreck, you find yourself washed up on the beach of an unknown island. The bodies of dead comrades and the wreckage are all around.

You’ve almost believed that you are alone on the island ... Then suddenly you face some local inhabitants, mysterious hostile creatures.They fiercely protect the remains of an ancient civilization.

Try to survive among beasts and find the way out of ancient ruins.
